import React, { useState } from 'react' import { CateringFormContainer, CateringFormImageContainer, CateringFormWrapper, H1, Image } from './CateringFormElements' import cateringmenu from '../../images/onlinecatering.png' const CateringForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}) const updateInput = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return ( <>
) } export default CateringForm
